name: Project Intake
description: Assess OpenClaw instance, existing channels, QIE module usage, integration goals

name: Full Integration Orchestration
description: Auto-execute all workflows in dependency order with progress tracking

name: Capability Mapping
description: Map QIE modules and workflows to potential OpenClaw skills with priority ranking

name: Channel Assessment
description: Assess which channels are active, needed, and prioritized for deployment

name: Integration Strategy
description: Define the overall QIE-to-OpenClaw bridge architecture and phased rollout plan

name: Skill Architecture
description: Design the skill package structure, TypeScript patterns, and ClawHub publishing model

name: Channel Routing
description: Design message routing from channels to QIE modules with intent classification

name: Session Design
description: Design cross-channel session continuity, context threading, and state persistence

name: Security Model
description: Design trust levels, whitelist rules, sandbox isolation, prompt injection defense

name: Create Module Skill
description: Build an OpenClaw skill for a specific QIE module (BuildOS, InvestOS, etc.)

name: Create Workflow Skill
description: Build an OpenClaw skill for a specific QIE workflow

name: Create Automation
description: Build a cron job, webhook, or event-driven automation triggering QIE workflows

name: Create Voice Skill
description: Build a voice-activated skill with ElevenLabs integration

name: Deploy Channel
description: Set up and configure a specific messaging channel with security baseline

name: Design Channel Experience
description: Design Quinn's presence and personality adaptation for a specific channel

name: Configure Voice
description: Set up voice interaction with ElevenLabs wake word and speech synthesis

name: Integration Test
description: Test skill-to-QIE connectivity end-to-end with automated verification

name: Channel Audit
description: Audit all active channels for health, security, and performance

name: Security Review
description: Full security posture review across all channels, skills, and automations

name: Quick Spec
description: Quick spec a single OC deliverable without full ceremony

name: Quick Deliver
description: Quick deliver a single OC output without full ceremony
